description: The variables included in the oraEM4Alert trap.

Summary.eval: ($v9 ne '') ? '$v9' : 'EM4 alert generated for metric name ($v4), value ($v12)'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4Alert ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTargetName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTargetType s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertHostName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMetricName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertKeyName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertKeyValue s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTimeStamp s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertSeverity s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMessage s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertRuleName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertRuleOwner s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMetricValue s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertContext s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the target to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTargetName

description: The type of the target to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTargetType

description: The name of the host on which this alert originated.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertHostName

description: The name of the metric or policy which generated this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMetricName

description: The name of the key-column, if present, for the metric which generated this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertKeyName

description: The value of the key-column, if present, for the metric which generated this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertKeyValue

description: The time at which this alert was generated.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertTimeStamp

description: The severity of the alert e.g. Critical.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertSeverity

description: The message associated with the alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMessage

description: The name of the notification rule that caused this notification.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertRuleName

description: The owner of the notification rule that caused this notification.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertRuleOwner

description: The value of the metric which caused this alert to be generated.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertMetricValue

description: A comma separated list of metric column names and values associated with the metric that caused this alert to be generated.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4AlertContext

description: The variables included in the oraEM4JobAlert trap.

event.Summary: EM4 $v3 job ($v1) alert occurred for metric name ($v9), value ($v10)

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlert ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobOwner s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobType s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobStatus s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertTargets s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertTimeStamp s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertRuleName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertRuleOwner s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertMetricName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertMetricValue s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertContext s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertKeyName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertKeyValue s EXAMPLE ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertSeverity s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the job to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobName

description: The owner of the job to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobOwner

description: The type of the job to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobType

description: The status of the job to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertJobStatus

description: A comma separated list of target to which this alert applies.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertTargets

description: The time at which this job status changed causing this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertTimeStamp

description: The name of the notification rule that caused this notification.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertRuleName

description: The owner of the notification rule that caused this notification.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertRuleOwner

description: The name of the metric or policy which caused the Corrective Action to run that caused this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertMetricName

description: The value of the metric which caused the Corrective Action to run that caused this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertMetricValue

description: A comma separated list of metric column names and values associated with the metric which caused the Corrective Action to run that caused this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertContext

description: The name of the key-column, if present, for the metric which caused the Corrective Action to run that generated this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertKeyName

description: The value of the key-column, if present, for the metric which caused the Corrective Action to run that generated this alert.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertKeyValue

description: The severity of the metric which caused the Corrective Action to run that generated this alert e.g. Critical.
variables.name: ORACLE-ENTERPRISE-MANAGER-4-MIB::oraEM4JobAlertSeverity
